# configurationUpdateHandler

**Instance Property**

A block for handling updates to the view’s configuration using the current state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var configurationUpdateHandler: UITableViewHeaderFooterView.ConfigurationUpdateHandler? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A configuration update handler provides an alternative approach to overriding [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/updateConfiguration(using:)] in a subclass. Set a configuration update handler to update the header footer view’s configuration using the new state in response to a configuration state change.

Setting the value of this property calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/setNeedsUpdateConfiguration()]. The system calls this handler after calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/updateConfiguration(using:)].

In iOS 18 and later, UIKit supports automatic trait tracking inside this closure for traits from this view’s `traitCollection`. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/automatic-trait-tracking].
